person.persName: Leonard Edelen (Marion County, Kentucky, hatter and merchant)

body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, hatter and merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Susan Bruce Edelen. Father of Mary C. Edelen, James H. Edelen, Lucinda Edelen, Leonard Edelen, Robert Hagin Edelen, and George T. Edelen. Engaged in manufacturing in 1840. Owned three enslaved persons in Marion County, Kentucky, in 1840. Hatter in Marion County, Kentucky, in 1850. Employed Thomas H. Brown as a hatter in 1850. Owned six enslaved persons in Marion County in 1850. Merchant in Marion County in 1860. Employed his sons, Leonard Edelen and Robert Hagin Edelen, as clerks in 1860.
